overview:
Senior executive with an extensive background in online media, mobile and video games communities. Experience in marketing, business development, product development, event marketing and communication.

Worked previously for SPIL Games as a portal / business development director, Chellomedia a Liberty Global company in the broadcast media industry and Orange and KPN in the telecommunication industry. At this moment, she started up Gamelosophers, an marketing agency focused on the game industry.

Defines business strategies for on-line consumer destination in video gaming, mobile entertainment and on-line e-commerces companies. Specialties

Experience in digital content distribution across multiple platform including video game delivery, mobile distribution technologies, multi player / communities services, e-commerce and marketing solutions. Successfully managed teams which are focused on business development, product development, marketing and digital content distribution. Understands how to build, deliver and monetize consumer driven services.
